backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining core domain models (users, journals, meditation sessions, progress, books) and initializing static book recommendations, with imports for authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report listing verified frontend features, affected files, dependencies, test IDs, and confidence for recent UI fixes on the active meditation timer screen.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of major frontend source files and components, used as reference documentation for build and feature planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme color tokens, layout primitives, and default background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata, favicon, viewport, and mounts the React app at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application bootstrap configuring TanStack Router routes, React Query client, Internet Identity provider, theme handling, and global toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Interactive carousel component for selecting looping ambient audio tracks with previous/next navigation, mute toggle, and volume control synced to an Audio element.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Reusable UI card component for displaying a featureâ€™s icon, title, and description with animation and hover styling.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Fixed floating navigation with animated icon buttons for Journal, Progress, and Books pages, showing labels on hover and routing via TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile-only slide-out hamburger menu that provides theme toggling, account status, navigation, and login/logout actions, integrating Internet Identity, routing, and React Query cache cleanup.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Full-screen animated canvas background that renders a breathing lotus and floating particles, adapting visibility and glow based on theme and a "default" or "enhanced" variant.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Circular carousel UI for selecting meditation types, showing one centered card with adjacent previews and navigation controls to cycle through predefined meditation options.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Conditional mobile-only floating back button that navigates the user back to the dashboard route when visible.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Multi-step modal quiz that asks users meditation-related questions, tracks answers, calculates a recommended meditation type, and returns the result via a callback.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Fixed session status badge showing whether the user is logged in or exploring as a guest, with actions to return to start or log out and clear authenticated query data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches a backend actor using React Query based on the current Internet Identity, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context, provider, and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout, identity persistence, and login status using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating meditation-related data, branching between authenticated backend calls and guest local storage, with mock data where backend APIs are missing.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables, custom color tokens, fonts, and base styles for the application.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a static list of meditation and mindfulness book recommendations with metadata and Amazon links, extending the backend Book type.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app, wiring up React Query and InternetIdentity providers and importing global styles.
Empty placeholder file for the Active Meditation page with no implementation yet.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Implements a themed, animated book recommendation carousel page with navigation, theme toggling, and UI controls using static book data.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main user dashboard that displays a daily inspirational quote, meditation selection carousel, and navigation elements. Handles theme toggling, quiz-based recommendations, and routing into pre-meditation flows.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Journal management page for viewing, filtering, editing, favoriting, deleting, and importing/exporting meditation reflections. Includes mood and energy indicators, search and filters, and full CRUD interactions via query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page that introduces the app and handles authentication or guest entry. Redirects authenticated users to the dashboard and supports theme toggling.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Pre-session setup page that guides users through meditation instructions, mood and energy selection, ambient music, and session controls. Records meditation sessions and optionally saves journal reflections.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Progress tracking page showing meditation statistics, streaks, ranks, and achievements. Supports importing/exporting meditation data and displays rank progression based on total minutes.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: File is present but contains no implementation, indicating a placeholder or unfinished reflection page.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: File is present but empty, suggesting a planned statistics page that has not yet been implemented.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Provides guest-only localStorage utilities for storing meditation journal entries and progress, including legacy key migration, CRUD helpers, and streak/minute updates after sessions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read URL parameters from query strings or hash routing, persist them in sessionStorage, and safely clear stored or hash parameters for session-level state like tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, dark mode strategy, plugins, and an extensive theme extension with OKLCH-based color tokens, layout settings, shadows, animations, and design tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the current SPA scope, architecture, and feature set, including authentication, guest mode, dashboards, meditation flows, theming, and versioned feature definitions.
